\begin{align*}
\left(\frac{b_1+b_2}{2}-l\right)^2 + h^2 & = l^2 \\
\left(\frac{8+16}{2}-l\right)^2 + 12^2 & = l^2 \\
\left(12-l\right)^2 + 144 & = l^2 \\
